name: Sylva rerum
description:
Mr Leopold has called detective Rosa because his sylva rerum was stolen. Sylva rerum is a family chronicle, written over generations. Who had taken it and why?

  • Expected playtime: 10—20 minutes.
  • Engine: RPG Maker XP.
  • Languages: Belarusian, English, Russian, Ukrainian.

This is an entry to the 30 Day RPG Maker Themed Game Jam #6.
